participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake enjoys the simplicity of country life.
participant_1.background: i drive a big truck and live in country. i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i work my parents farms.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Sophia has a passion for exploring new cuisines and cultures.
participant_2.background: i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it.
